cause.description:
Building people’s self-esteem and confidence is something in which friends, parents, and even teachers have interest in. Sadly not every child develops healthy self-confidence or strong self-esteem. If you’re reading this, you may be thinking to yourself, “Yeah I wish I had more self-esteem and confidence.” There are many people throughout the world who wish they were someone else, or fear their own physical appearance. I believe this comes from lacking self-esteem and confidence. If people had more self assurance of themselves, they wouldn’t be thinking negatively, or maybe they wouldn’t put themselves down about making decisions.
1. Confidence in oneself or one's own abilities
2. self-esteem - a feeling of pride in yourself
3. self-assurance - freedom from doubt; belief in yourself and your abilities
cause.name: Self esteem & confidence
